name: Zumzum Limitied
description:
We are a cloud computing solutions and services provider working with products from Google, Salesforce.com and Zumzum Financials. Zumzum is proud to be one of the first Google Apps Premier SMB Resellers in the UK and a Salesforce Consulting Partner. Zumzum helps you to innovate with cloud computing, reduce IT costs and free up your most valuable resources to focus on growing your revenues.
Our focus, intimate knowledge and close working relationships with Google & Salesforce allows us to offer you world class services to make the most of your investment in cloud computing. Zumzum offers a full range of cloud computing solutions to help your people be more efficient and effective.
